How to Begin¶

For Downloaders¶

  1. Install our program by downloading it from the link below: Installation Page

    After the installation is complete, run the program.

  2. Drag your Excel files into the appropriate slots. Each slot should contain an Excel file from a courier and Naver.

  3. Done! Now you can download the integrated Excel file.

For Web Users¶

  1. Visit our homepage: here

  2. Drag your Excel files into the appropriate slots. Each slot should contain an Excel file from a courier and Naver.

  3. Done! Now you can download the integrated Excel file.

NaverstoreExcelEase
